function.name: create_task
function.description: Creates a new actionable task in the local Postgres database based on the user's request. Use this when the user explicitly asks to remember something, set a reminder, or create a to-do item.

title.description: A concise, actionable title for the task (max 50 characters).

description.description: Detailed context or steps required to complete the task. Leave empty if not provided.

priority.description: The urgency of the task. Default to 'medium' unless the user implies urgency.
